item.title: My first script. (autotalker)[RS2]
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

ok guys here is my final version of the script for now. id like more people than just one to try it out and give me some ideas and how to make it better. i just want a challenge and see if i can do it. but here it is anyways.

[scar]{============================================================================*
| |
| NAME : Mjordans Simple Autotalker |
| WRITER : Mjordan |
| CATEGORY : Talker |
| DESCRIPTION : Types So You Wont Have To |
| USAGE : To Type For You |
| CONTACT : MSN: RunescapePasswords_@msn.com |
| AIM: mjordan7468 |
| NOTES : To Stop Script Press F12 |
| |
============================================================================
| ______ ___ __ __ |
|/\ __ \ / _ \ /_\ ______ _ ____ \ \ ______ ___ |
|\ \ \ \ / / \ \ // /\ __ \ /`'\ _____\ \ /\ __ \ /’ __`\ |
| \ \ \ \ / \ \ \ __ \ \ \ \ \ \ / /\ __ \ \ \ \ _\ \ /\ /\ \ |
| \ \ \ / \ \ \ /\ \ \ \ _\ \ \ \ \ \ _\ \ \ \ __ \ \ \ \ \ |
| \ _\ \ _\ \ \ \ _\ _\ \ _\ \ \ _\ _\ _\ _\ |
| // // \ \ \ // /_/ /,_\ //// //// |
| __ \ \ \ |
| /\ _/ / |
| \ _/ |
| __/ |
| |
============================================================================
| |
| ++++++++++++[Rs2][SRL] Autotalker [SRL][Rs2]++++++++++++ |
| |
============================================================================
| INSTRUCTIONS |
============================================================================
| |
| 1.Type In What You want To Say On Lines 59-62 |
| 2.Drag Crosshair To Runescape Client |
| 3.Press Run Button |
| |
============================================================================
| Version History |
============================================================================
| |
| Version 1.0 - Completed And Released |
| Version 2.0 - Reworked To Make It Less Dectable |
| And Made Using SRL(big thanks for all the help Weibs) |
| Version 2.5 - Just Added A Few Little Things Here And There |
| (big thanks again weibs) |
*============================================================================|
| |
| !!!I Am NOT Responsible If Any Of Your Characters Get Banned!!! |
| |
*============================================================================}

program Autotalker;
{.Include SRL/SRL.Scar}
{.include srl\srl\extended\xtext.scar}

const
//type the messages you want to say here

msg1 =‘white:wave:selling coal 250ea’;
msg2 =‘selling coal 250ea-mjordan’;
msg3 =‘white:coal 250gp each!!!’;
msg4 =‘selling coal~mjordan~’;

procedure credits;
begin
writeln(’<========================================================>’)
writeLn(’ Thankyou for using Mjordans’)
writeLn(’ Simple Autotalker.’)
writeLn(‘Big thanks to Rons Autotalker Where I Got Some Ideas From,’)
writeLn(‘All Of The Tuts With Which I Used That Helped Me Lots,’)
writeLn(‘And Most Of All Thanks To Kaitnieks For Creating SCAR’)
writeLn(’<========================================================>’)
end;

//procedure SendMyText(Text: String);
//end;

procedure RandomTalk;
begin
case Random(4) of
0 : SendMyText(msg1);
1 : SendMyText(msg2);//randomly types the messages. is very human like.
2 : SendMyText(msg3);
3 : SendMyText(msg4);
End;
End;

begin
setupsrl;
credits;
activateclient;
wait(200);
repeat
RandomTalk;
Wait(2000+Random(3000));
Until(IsFKeyDown(12))//if you want to end the script just press F12
End.[/scar]

Read full topic

item.title: My first script. (autotalker)[RS2]
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

Weibs:

After RandomTalk; in your main loop add a Wait(2000+random(1000)); Of course, you can use whatever times you’d like.

ooo ok well thats what i thought. i tried that out but i just didnt put enough time in. i forgot that its in milliseconds lol :o

[quote=“Weibs, post:11, topic:14622”]Nice script btw. Nice job using the IsFKeyDown, that’s a lot better than false. You can run into some big problems with never ending loops.

-Weibs.[/quote]

thanks weibs youv helped me ALOT. i even added your name in the script in the version history. you dont even know how happy i am that my first script turned out so good. hopefully more complex and better ones to come. thinking of my next one as i type this.

Read full topic

item.title: My first script. (autotalker)[RS2]
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

After RandomTalk; in your main loop add a Wait(2000+random(1000)); Of course, you can use whatever times you’d like.

Nice script btw. Nice job using the IsFKeyDown, that’s a lot better than false. You can run into some big problems with never ending loops.

-Weibs.

Read full topic

item.title: My first script. (autotalker)[RS2]
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

ok thanks m8 i think i got it now i think.here it is.
but one thing i cant figure out, where do i put the wait for it to wait inbetween typing the messages?

[scar]{============================================================================*
| |
| NAME : Mjordans Simple Autotalker |
| WRITER : Mjordan |
| CATEGORY : Talker |
| DESCRIPTION : Types So You Wont Have To |
| USAGE : To Type For You |
| CONTACT : MSN: RunescapePasswords_@msn.com |
| AIM: mjordan7468 |
| NOTES : To Stop Script Press F12 |
| |
============================================================================
| ______ ___ __ __ |
|/\ __ \ / _ \ /_\ ______ _ ____ \ \ ______ ___ |
|\ \ \ \ / / \ \ // /\ __ \ /`'\ _____\ \ /\ __ \ /’ __`\ |
| \ \ \ \ / \ \ \ __ \ \ \ \ \ \ / /\ __ \ \ \ \ _\ \ /\ /\ \ |
| \ \ \ / \ \ \ /\ \ \ \ _\ \ \ \ \ \ _\ \ \ \ __ \ \ \ \ \ |
| \ _\ \ _\ \ \ \ _\ _\ \ _\ \ \ _\ _\ _\ _\ |
| // // \ \ \ // /_/ /,_\ //// //// |
| __ \ \ \ |
| /\ _/ / |
| \ _/ |
| __/ |
| |
============================================================================
| |
| ++++++++++++[Rs2][SRL] Autotalker [SRL][Rs2]++++++++++++ |
| |
============================================================================
| INSTRUCTIONS |
============================================================================
| 1.Type In What You want To Say On Lines 58-61 |
| 2.Drag Crosshair To Runescape Client |
| 3.Press Run |
| 4.Its Probably Not The Best Idea To Use This On A Good Account, But it
| Should Be Ok If You Do. |
============================================================================
| Version History |
============================================================================
| |
| Version 1.0 - Completed And Released |
| Version 2.0 - Reworked To Make It Less Dectable |
| And Made Using SRL(big thanks for all the help Weibs) |
*============================================================================|
| |
| !!!I Am NOT Responsible If Any Of Your Characters Get Banned!!! |
| |
*============================================================================}

program Autotalker;
{.Include SRL/SRL.Scar}
{.include srl\srl\extended\xtext.scar}

const
//type the messages you want to say here

msg1 =‘white:wave:selling coal 250ea’;
msg2 =‘selling coal 250ea-mjordan’;
msg3 =‘white:coal 250gp each!!!’;
msg4 =‘selling coal~mjordan~’;

procedure credits;
begin
writeln(’<========================================================>’)
writeLn(’ Thankyou for using Mjordans’)
writeLn(’ Simple Autotalker.’)
writeLn(‘Big thanks to Rons Autotalker Where I Got Some Ideas From,’)
writeLn(‘All Of The Tuts With Which I Used That Helped Me Lots,’)
writeLn(‘And Most Of All Thanks To Kaitnieks For Creating SCAR’)
writeLn(’<========================================================>’)
end;

//procedure SendMyText(Text: String);
//end;

procedure RandomTalk;
begin
case Random(4) of
0 : SendMyText(msg1);//randomly types message. is very humanlike.
1 : SendMyText(msg2);// another procedure that send text humanlike
2 : SendMyText(msg3);
3 : SendMyText(msg4);
End;
End;

begin
setupsrl;
credits;
activateclient;
wait(200);
repeat
RandomTalk;
Until(IsFKeyDown(12))//if you want to end the script just press F12
End.[/scar]

item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

[scar]{============================================================================*
| |
| NAME : Mjordans Simple Autotalker |
| WRITER : Mjordan |
| CATEGORY : Talker |
| DESCRIPTION : Types So You Wont Have To |
| USAGE : To Type For You |
| AUTOCOLOR : Yes |
| CONTACT : MSN: RunescapePasswords_@msn.com |
| AIM: mjordan7468 |
| |
============================================================================
| ______ ___ __ __ |
|/\ __ \ / _ \ /_\ ______ _ ____ \ \ ______ ___ |
|\ \ \ \ / / \ \ // /\ __ \ /`'\ _____\ \ /\ __ \ /’ __`\ |
| \ \ \ \ / \ \ \ __ \ \ \ \ \ \ / /\ __ \ \ \ \ _\ \ /\ /\ \ |
| \ \ \ / \ \ \ /\ \ \ \ _\ \ \ \ \ \ _\ \ \ \ __ \ \ \ \ \ |
| \ _\ \ _\ \ \ \ _\ _\ \ _\ \ \ _\ _\ _\ _\ |
| // // \ \ \ // /_/ /,_\ //// //// |
| __ \ \ \ |
| /\ _/ / |
| \ _/ |
| __/ |
| | |
============================================================================
| |
| ++++++++++++[Rs2][SRL] Autotalker [SRL][Rs2]++++++++++++ |
| |
============================================================================
| INSTRUCTIONS |
============================================================================
| 1.Type In What You want To Say On Line 60 |
| 2.Drag Crosshair To Runescape Client |
| 3.Press Run |
| 4.I Most Deffinatly Would NOT Use This On Any Account Other Than A Crappy |
| One That You Dont Care If It Gets Banned.THIS IS JUST ONE OF MY FIRST |
| SCRIPTS, NOT MEANT TO BE USED REALLY. JUST TO SEE WHAT YOU GUYS THINK |
| BECAUSE I AM GOING TO TRY AND START SCRIPTING! |
| |
|
============================================================================
| Version History |
============================================================================
| |
| Version 1.0 - Completed And Released |
| Version 2.0 - Reworked To Make It Less Dectable |
| And Made Using SRL(big thanks for all the help Weibs) |
*============================================================================}

program Autotalker;
{.Include SRL/SRL.Scar}
{.include srl\srl\extended\xtext.scar}

const
//type the messages you want to say here

msg1 =‘white:wave:selling coal 250ea’;//make some messages different.
msg2 =‘selling coal 250ea-mjodan’; //put flaws in them like the examples i have
msg3 =‘white:coal 250gp each!!!’; //so it will be more humanlike
msg4 =‘selloing coal-mjordan’;

procedure credits;
begin
writeln(’<========================================================>’)
writeLn(’ Thankyou for using Mjordans’)
writeLn(’ Simple Autotalker.’)
writeLn(‘Big thanks to Rons Autotalker Where I Got Some Ideas From,’)
writeLn(‘All Of The Tuts With Which I Used That Helped Me Lots,’)
writeLn(‘And Most Of All Thanks To Kaitnieks For Creating SCAR’)
writeLn(’<========================================================>’)
end;

//procedure SendMyText(Text: String);
//end;

procedure RandomTalk;
begin
case Random(4) of
0 : SendMyText(msg1);
1 : SendMyText(msg2);
2 : SendMyText(msg3);
3 : SendMyText(msg4);
End;
End;

begin
setupsrl;
credits;
activateclient;
repeat
SendMyText(‘Either delete this line, or change it to a message.’)
wait(100);
RandomTalk;
Until(IsFKeyDown(12))
End.[/scar]

SendMyText is already a procedure in SRL, you don’t need to add it to your script.

I can explain more later, gotta go

-Weibs.

Read full topic

item.title: My first script. (autotalker)[RS2]
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Ok, a good typing function, taken from SRL, would be SendText2(Text: String): Boolean;
This function will type the keys with random waits inbetween, and will sometimes even make mistakes. If the function does make a mistake, it will return true, but you don’t really need to do anything with that.

Heres an example of how to have the script choose randomly one of the messages and type using SendText2;

Say you have 4 messages.

[scar]case random(4) of
0 : SendText2(msg1);
1 : SendText2(msg2);
2 : SendText2(msg3);
3 : SendText2(msg4);
end;[/scar]

That would choose a random message out of the selection. The only things you’d need to change would be the number within random(). Put it as the number of messages you have. Also, if you have 5 messages, you’d need to add another line to the case…of statement. Like this…
[scar] 4 : SendText2(msg5);[/scar] I think you get the pattern. If you have any other questions, just reply back.

One more thing, to use that case statement, you could put it in a procedure like this…
[scar]procedure RandomMessage;
begin
case random(4) of
0 : SendText2(msg1);
1 : SendText2(msg2);
2 : SendText2(msg3);
3 : SendText2(msg4);
end;
end;[/scar]
And then you could call it in the main loop or where ever you’re calling the typing procedure, but you’d have to add a wait after it so that it doesn’t type one message right after the other.

Hope this helps,

-Weibs.

Read full topic

item.title: My first script. (autotalker)[RS2]

@mjordan wrote:

=) thanks weibs. and i was wondering about this but how would you make it wait a certain time inbetween each letter it typed? and could i make it like to where i put msg1 msg2 msg3 and so on and make it say one of those randomly?

item.title: My first script. (autotalker)[RS2]
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Good first script. For future reference, I’d use one of the sendKeys function found in SRL’s Text file. Look for it in the core folder. One of them is really humanlike because it uses reasonable random times inbetween key strokes. I think it even makes mistakes sometimes, and it may even fix them. Can’t remember for sure.

But I’d look into that, and maybe some more anti-ban stuff, but overall good first script, and great commentry.

-Weibs

Read full topic

ok well guys ive been around forever and i have mostly just helped people with everything and anything, but now i want to start making some scripts so i guess this will be my first script that i will post. and please dont use on a good account to test it out, just a lil crappy account. this isnt really meant to be used just for a test, just to tell me what i could and should have done better so i can get the hang of scripting. thanks

EDIT: OK HERES THE NEWEST VERSION OF THE SCRIPT. PLEASE TEST OUT AND REPLY WITH ANY IDEAS AND HOW TO MAKE BETTER.
